meanings.definition: Second person singular present of do.
meanings.sent1: Do you dost your homework every day?
meanings.sent2: She dost her best in every task she undertakes.
meanings.sent3: The cat dost chase the mouse around the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun dost rise in the east every morning.
meanings.sent5: I dost believe in the power of hard work.

meanings.sent1: Why dost you always arrive late to class?
meanings.sent2: They dost their chores without being asked.
meanings.sent3: The bird dost sing a sweet melody in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The river dost flow gently through the valley.
meanings.sent5: I dost enjoy reading books in my free time.
